heading: This Afternoon
text: Mostly cloudy with a few pockets of sunshine. Snow showers diminishing. Highs from the single digits to teens in the north, increasing into the 20s as you head south. Northwest wind at 5 to 10 mph.

heading: Tonight
text: An increasing chance of snow showers from the west after midnight. Lows from the negatives to just above 0 in the north, to near 10 in the south. Northwest wind near 10 mph in the evening, diminishing to light and variable.

heading: Sunday
text: Sunshine with mixed clouds. A few lingering snow showers. Highs from the teens in the north, increasing into the 20s in the south. Light wind.
